p: However, very little or no aldehydes were detectable in potato chips deep-fried in the extra virgin olive and especially the MRAFO oils under exactly the same conditions [Fig.Â 4(a)]. Indeed, only barely detectable traces of n-alkanals and trans-2-alkenals were found in those fried in the latter oil, and only following the 4 th deep-frying episode at that.
